name: Tanks! 3D Demo
description:
A Tank fighting game inspired by Wii Play Tanks but in 3D, where you progress through levels by defeating enemy tanks.

A short demo of my upcoming Tanks 3D game. Currently, 10 levels are done, but I plan to finish all 100 levels based on the Wii Play Tanks game and include original levels of my own separately within the game and a level editor and randomizer.
